items.title: OpenSys Pilots PalmWav, A Prototype Palm-Recognition Payment Technology
items.summary:
OpenSys Technologies Sdn Bhd has introduced PalmWav, a prototype palm-recognition technology for seamless, device-free payments in Malaysia. The system is designed to integrate with the country’s existing payment infrastructure, including PayNet’s MyDebit network. The prototype was recently showcased internally to OpenSys employees and key partners, piloted at two locations: Kom.Fi Café in Kuala Lumpur, and […]

The post OpenSys Pilots PalmWav, A Prototype Palm-Recognition Payment Technology appeared first on Lowyat.NET.

items.title: CelcomDigi Accepts 1,800 MHz, 2,600MHz Band Spectrum Assignment
items.summary:
CelcomDigi has announced that it has accepted new spectrum assignments from the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC). More specifically, the telco has received assignments of 2x5MHz in the 1800MHz spectrum frequency band and 2×20 MHz of the 2600MHz spectrum frequency band. These took effect on 30 November, and are up until 30 June 2032 […]

items.title: Bissell’s Little Green Mini portable deep cleaner saves carpets, upholstery, more for $75 this Cyber Monday
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s Cyber Monday Sale, you can pick up the new Bissell Little Green Mini Portable Carpet and Upholstery Deep Cleaner at $74.99 shipped, which joins the lineup of portable deep cleaner deals from the brand that began during last week’s Black Friday event. Usually fetching $95 at full price, discounts over the year have been few and far between, and have gone as low as $70 once back during July’s Prime Day event. While that low rate is not returning, you are getting a second chance at the second-best price with $20 struck from the tag. You can also check out Bissell’s other ongoing Black Friday/Cyber Monday cleaner deals here, which start from $85.

items.title: Lenovo’s budget-friendly 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet with Tab Pen stylus hits $180 all-time low for Cyber Monday
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Cyber Monday sale, Lenovo is offering its 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet with a Tab Pen stylus for $180.49 shipped once you enter promo code EXTRAFIVE during checkout. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year, carrying a $290 price tag, so you’re looking at a straight-up $110 discount on it today. We saw this variant with the stylus drop to $210 last month as part of the early Black Friday offers, but today’s deal shaves an additional $20 off to mark a new best price to beat. It is, in fact, now fetching the same price as just the tablet by itself without the stylus at Best Buy. Head below for more details, along with deals on some other Lenovo tablets.

more…

items.title: NOCO’s Boost+Air AX65 starter jumps car batteries, inflates tires, and acts as a power bank for a $210 low (Reg. $300)
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s Cyber Monday Sale that is in full swing now, you can find the NOCO Boost+Air AX65 2000A Jump Starter and Air Compressor Tire Inflator at $209.96 shipped. Normally going for $300 at full price since hitting the market back in February, we’ve only seen this price three times before in 2025, with discounts otherwise keeping things at $240 or higher. Now, you can grab this 2-in-1 device back at its best price, saving you $90 in the process.

All models went $250 off at Amazon for Black Friday – most of them still are – but B&H is now offering a giant $300 off the most affordable 24GB model you can buy.

Only on the market for a little over two months, we’ve seen previous discounts take things down as low as $139 so far, which is getting beaten out by these holiday savings now. You can pick one up with $77 savings that lowers costs at the best new price we have tracked.

more…

The official Best Buy Cyber Monday sale just went live and it’s a real banger. items.title: Get versatile styling and drying from Shark’s FlexStyle system with six tools at a new $230 Cyber Monday low (Reg. $370)
items.summary:
As part of its Cyber Monday Sale, Amazon is offering the Shark FlexStyle Hair Styling System for all hair types at $229.99 shipped. Coming down from its full $370 tag, we’ve seen discounts take the price as low as $249 previously, with that rate being beaten out by these Black Friday/Cyber Monday savings. While the Dyson Airwrap is a popular styling option, you’ll get a similar experience at a much lower cost here, saving $140 off the going rate for a new all-time low price, as far as we have tracked. You can also find its limited-edition Black Cherry colorway down at a new all-time low of $249.99 shipped.

items.title: New York becomes the first US state to require retailers to disclose use of algorithmic pricing tied to personal data; 10+ states are considering similar bills (Tim Balk/New York Times)
items.summary:
Tim Balk / New York Times:
New York becomes the first US state to require retailers to disclose use of algorithmic pricing tied to personal data; 10+ states are considering similar bills  —  The new law seeks to prevent retailers from ripping off consumers by using artificial intelligence and their personal data to charge them higher prices.

The big Amazon Cyber Monday sale got off to an early start this year and is now carrying over the best of the Echo smart speaker deals. This includes the ultra-affordable Echo Pop, this sweet Iron Man bundle with the official Marvel stand, my personal favorite Echo Spot model, and the first deals on the brand new premium Echo Dot Max and Echo Studio. All of the deal are sitting right here and you’ll find some additional details below.

items.title: Cyber Monday offers rare price cut on NVIDIA Shield Pro + TV stick for media/gaming at lows starting from $125
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s Black Friday Week Sale, we just spotted an extremely rare discount on the NVIDIA Shield Pro Android TV Streaming Media Player for $169.99 shipped. This popular device has spent the overwhelming majority of 2025 keeping to its $200 full price, with the discounts larger than a few dollars having only occurred once, way back in February, when it fell to $180. Now, during this holiday event, you can pick one up with the year’s biggest $40 markdown that lands it at the best price we have tracked in 2025. You can also find the NVIDIA SHIELD Android TV Stick benefiting from an equally rare cut to its lowest price of $124.99 shipped, down from $150.

more…

items.title: This ultra slim MagSafe power bank matches your iPhone 17 Pro at a fraction of the price of Apple’s, now just $36
items.summary:
TORRAS MiniMag ultra-slim 5,000mAh power bank

Buy for $36 (Reg. $53)

What we love

This is another solid alternative to the Apple model that is specifically made for the new iPhone Air. Not only does it pack a bigger 5,000mAh battery than the 3,149mAh unit in the official model, it’s also quite thin at just 0.3 inches and a lot more affordable today for Cyber Monday.

more…

items.title: Anker’s eufy solar security cameras, smart locks, more get up to 50% Cyber Monday savings to new lows starting from $50
items.summary:
With Amazon’s Black Friday Week Sale in full momentum, Anker’s official eufy storefront is offering up to 50% discounts across its lineup of smart security devices, and the best rate yet on the SoloCam S220 Wireless Solar Security Camera that starts from $49.99 shipped, while its 4-camera package is a great get for multi-point coverage at $179.99 shipped. Normally going for $100 without any discounts, we’ve seen the cost get taken down as low as $60 previously in the year, with this holiday deal bringing even more savings to the mix by cutting the price in half. You’ll save $50 off the going rate for a 50% markdown on the single-cam package, while the 4-camera kit is seeing a 36% cut of $100 – dropping both options to new all-time lows. We’ve also collected the brand’s best smart device deals this season into a list below.

more…

items.title: Ninja’s latest CREAMi ice cream maker comes with soft-serve dispenser at new $238 Cyber Monday low, more
items.summary:
Update 12/1: Ninja has dropped the price even further on this CREAMi Ice Cream Maker to a new all-time low of $237.99 shipped, after clipping the on-page 15% off coupon.

As part of Amazon’s ongoing Black Friday Week Sale, you can pick up Ninja’s CREAMi Scoop & Swirl Ice Cream and Soft Serve Maker at $297.49 shipped. It has spent most of the time since hitting the market in February keeping to its full $350 price tag, though we have seen three prior drops to $300 at Amazon since September. For Black Friday, things are going a little lower as this 15% markdown cuts $53 off the tag to land it at the best new price we have tracked at Amazon, with it beaten out by a drop to $290 from earlier in the year at an alternate marketplace. We’ve also collected all the other great Ninja kitchen gadgets that are seeing Black Friday savings below, as well, giving you one-stop shopping for all the brand’s discounted gear.

more…

items.summary:
Update: Amazon seems to be having issues with this listing at the moment, it appears as though it will be live again at $69 any moment though.

Just when it looked like the incredible AirPods Black Friday deals were gone forever, Cyber Monday has arrived with the goods. The AirPods 4 with ANC actually dropped another $1 and are now live at $99, and now the base model set just came back in-stock at $69 shipped – that’s a current-generation set of AirPods at under $70.

items.title: Rare deal knocks the official DualSense Edge PlayStation pro controller down to $160 low for Cyber Monday
items.summary:
Update 11/30: PlayStation’s Cyber Monday deals are now live, and you can score the DualSense Edge pro controller in white down at $159.99 shipped. The Midnight Black variant of this gamepad is also discounted to $169 shipped with a relatively lighter deal.

  • PlayStation 5 (slim) $449 (Reg. $550)
  • PlayStation 5 digital edition (slim) $399 (Reg. $500)
  • PlayStation 5 Pro $649 (Reg. $750)
  • PlayStation 5 NBA 2K26 bundle $450 (Reg. $550)
  • PlayStation 5 Ghost of Yōtei bundle $499 (Reg. $599)

We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops Sony’s DualSense Edge pro controller in white down to $159.99 shipped. Regularly $200, this controller is now seeing a rare deal at a 20% discount to match the lowest price it briefly hit last week for the first time. This is the price we expected to see for this model during GameStop’s official Black Friday sale, as $174.99 shipped with a relatively lighter deal. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: First deal strikes Logitech’s MX Master 4 for Mac variant with haptics for Cyber Monday, more from $10
items.summary:
As part of its now live Cyber Monday deals, Amazon is offering a notable first deal on Logitech’s MX Master 4 for Mac variant for $113.99 shipped. This new model hit the scene a couple of months back carrying a $120 price, and today’s Cyber Monday deal lands as the first deal we’ve tracked for this variant optimised for Mac. We previously saw the standard MX Master 4 and the MX Master 4 Business variants briefly drop in price, but this is the first time we’re seeing this unit in Space Black and White Silver colorways see a discount. Although it’s not a huge markdown, it’s still a notable one considering this is Logitech’s flagship mouse that’s only been out for a couple of months now. The mouse is currently fetching its full $120 price directly at Logitech, but you get to pick between some freebies including a Logitech Studio series DESK MAT that’ll pair nicely with the mouse. Head below for more details along with deals on other Logitech gear.

more…
